requirement_tested: Create a one-page website for promoting Fundraiser Day
user_persona: A first-time visitor interested in learning about Fundraiser Day.
user_goal: To land on the homepage and immediately understand what Fundraiser Day is about.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah discovers the Fundraiser Day website and lands on the homepage. She expects a clear introduction to the event right away.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads with a full-width header titled 'Fundraiser Day', a welcoming message, and a logo image displayed prominently at the top.

requirement_tested: Include an introduction section for the Fundraiser Day event
user_persona: A potential donor exploring the site for event details.
user_goal: To read the introductory content explaining Fundraiser Day.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Intro Content
narrative_steps.description: John scrolls down slightly and focuses on the introductory section to get a quick overview of the event.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: He sees a centered title 'Fundraiser Day', descriptive text below it, and a logo image, all against a cornsilk background.

requirement_tested: Implement an automatically moving carousel to display offers
user_persona: A supporter looking for ways to contribute or participate.
user_goal: To see various offers related to Fundraiser Day without needing to interact.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Carousel Auto-Scroll
narrative_steps.description: Emily notices a slideshow of offers cycling automatically every few seconds as she reads further.
narrative_steps.action: Wait and observe the carousel behavior.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Slides change automatically every 5 seconds, showing different promotional offers with images, headlines, descriptions, and CTA buttons styled in peru.

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over Carousel
narrative_steps.description: Curious how it works, Emily moves her cursor over the carousel to pause the automatic rotation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Auto-scroll pauses while hovering, allowing her to examine the current slide more closely.

requirement_tested: Add a testimonials section to showcase fundraiser stories
user_persona: A skeptical user seeking proof of impact before engaging.
user_goal: To find real-life experiences shared by previous participants.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Testimonials
narrative_steps.description: Mark scrolls down to the testimonials section hoping to see authentic feedback from others involved.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid-based layout presents multiple testimonial cards, each with a profile picture, name, role, and quoted feedback, all styled consistently with a cornsilk background.

user_persona: A corporate representative evaluating partnership opportunities.
user_goal: To learn about the organization behind Fundraiser Day.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Company Info
narrative_steps.description: Lisa reaches the bottom of the page where she finds the company's mission and contact details.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the company info section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: She sees a paragraph detailing the mission, a clickable email link, and social media icons, all presented cleanly with subtle visual separation.

requirement_tested: Set cornsilk as the main background color
user_goal: To verify that the entire website uses cornsilk as the primary background color.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Background Color
narrative_steps.description: Alex reviews the overall design to ensure brand guidelines are followed correctly.
narrative_steps.action: Visually inspect the background color across all sections.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every section maintains a uniform cornsilk (#FFF8DC) background throughout the site.

user_persona: A UI/UX auditor checking accessibility compliance.
user_goal: To confirm that interactive components use the specified accent color.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Control Colors
narrative_steps.description: Jamie inspects interactive elements like buttons and navigation controls for correct color usage.
narrative_steps.action: Examine buttons, arrows, and form elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All control elements are styled with the peru (#CD853F) color scheme as per the specification.

requirement_tested: Ensure all sections are accessible via scrolling on a single page
user_persona: A casual browser wanting to explore everything quickly.
user_goal: To scroll seamlessly through all content areas without interruption.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling Through Sections
narrative_steps.description: Tom begins at the top and slowly scrolls downward to take in all parts of the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each section flows naturally beneath the last, allowing smooth transition from intro to offers, testimonials, and company info.

requirement_tested: Make the website responsive across desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the site on their phone.
user_goal: To navigate the website comfortably on a small screen.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Rachel opens the Fundraiser Day site on her smartphone and checks if the layout adapts properly.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window or open site on mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsivelyâ€”fonts resize, grids rearrange, and spacing optimizes for smaller screens.

requirement_tested: Provide navigation aids for smooth browsing between sections
user_persona: A frequent visitor who knows exactly what he wants to revisit.
user_goal: To jump directly to specific sections using navigation links.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Bar
narrative_steps.description: David prefers clicking navigation items instead of scrolling long distances.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a navigation anchor like 'Testimonials'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page smoothly scrolls to the selected section using animated transitions.

requirement_tested: Fetch dynamic content from backend APIs if applicable
user_goal: To confirm that frontend components pull live data from backend endpoints.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Offers
narrative_steps.description: Devon opens the browser console to monitor network activity upon page load.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools and refresh the page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Network tab shows successful GET requests to '/api/offers' and '/api/testimonials' returning populated JSON data.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'install:all' script for frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A new team member setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To install all necessary dependencies efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Mike clones the repo and needs to prepare both environments for development.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' in the terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend folders execute their respective 'npm install' commands concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with 'dev' script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer ready to begin coding and testing changes.
user_goal: To launch the full application stack easily.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Anna wants to run the app locally to test her latest updates.
narrative_steps.action: Execute 'npm run dev' from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend servers boot up concurrently, enabling live reloading and API access.

requirement_tested: Connect backend to PostgreSQL using provided environment variables if dynamic data is needed
user_persona: A systems administrator validating infrastructure setup.
user_goal: To ensure secure and reliable database connectivity.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: Ben checks whether the backend service connects successfully to the configured PostgreSQL instance.
narrative_steps.action: Check logs after starting the backend server.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Log indicates successful connection established using environment variables: DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, and DB_NAME.
